author: pipermerriam
content:
For the call I'm thinking early next week,  Tuesday/Wednesday  I'll leave timezone open for now and will zero in on a time that works for everyone once I know who's going to participate.

In the meantime, if you have not yet read the "state network use cases" forum post linked above, that is a good place to start.  Afterwards, if you have opinions or thoughts on the overall architecture of this network, now would be the time to start gathering your thoughts and writing them down in a way that is consumable by others so that we can all be in a good place to begin evaluating different appraoches/architectures and find a common path forward.
